public class Key
extends Object

      Searches in the database for a Key object with the supplied id

      Returns all permissions of the key
      Set<Permission> getVisiblePermissions()
      Returns a Set of Permissions of the following Types: 1.
      void grantPermission(AbstractLambda lambda, PermissionType type)
      Adds a Permission for the supplied lambda of the supplied type to this Key Object Adding an already existing Permission or a Permission where the equivalent User-Permission exists, doesn't change anything

      Adds a Permission for the supplied User of the supplied type to this Key Object Adding an already existing Permission doesn't change anything
      boolean hasPermission(AbstractLambda lambda, PermissionType type)
      Checks if the Key has the Permission of the supplied PermissionType for the supplied Lambda Returns always true, if the key is the primaryKey of the supplied Lambdas User

      Checks if the Key has the Permission of the supplied PermissionType for the supplied User Returns always true, if the key is the primaryKey of the supplied User
      boolean isPrimaryKey()
      Returns true if this key is a primaryKey, false otherwise

      Removes a Permission for the supplied lambda of the supplied type to this Key Object If the Permission doesn't exist, nothing changes
      void revokePermission(User user, PermissionType type)
      Removes a Permission for the supplied User of the supplied type to this Key Object If the Permission doesn't exist, nothing changes

    • Method Detail

      • getPermissions

        public Set<Permission> getPermissions()
        Returns all permissions of the key
        Returns:
        Set of Permissions

      • getVisiblePermissions

        public Set<Permission> getVisiblePermissions()
        Returns a Set of Permissions of the following Types: 1. User-Permissions of this Key for the currently authenticated User 2. Lambda-Permissions of this Key for the currently authenticated Users Lambdas 3. User-Permissions of this Key, sharing a User with the currently authenticated Keys GRANT-Permissions 4. Lambda-Permissions of this Key, sharing a Lambda with the currently authenticated Keys GRANT-Permissions
        Returns:
        Set of those Permissions

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission(AbstractLambda lambda,
                             PermissionType type)
        Checks if the Key has the Permission of the supplied PermissionType for the supplied Lambda Returns always true, if the key is the primaryKey of the supplied Lambdas User
        Parameters:
        lambda - a Permission has to be a Permission for this Lambda
        type - a Permission has to be a Permission of this Type
        Returns:
        returns if the queried Permission exists

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission(User user,
                             PermissionType type)
        Checks if the Key has the Permission of the supplied PermissionType for the supplied User Returns always true, if the key is the primaryKey of the supplied User
        Parameters:
        user - a Permission has to be a Permission for this User
        type - a Permission has to be a Permission of this Type
        Returns:
        returns if the queried Permission exists

      • isPrimaryKey

        public boolean isPrimaryKey()
        Returns true if this key is a primaryKey, false otherwise
        Returns:
        value

      • delete

        public void delete()
            throws InsufficientPermissionsException
        Deletes this Key from the Database
        Throws:
        InsufficientPermissionsException - if the current Threads authenticated Key is no PrimaryKey

      • grantPermission

        public void grantPermission(AbstractLambda lambda,
                            PermissionType type)
                     throws InsufficientPermissionsException
        Adds a Permission for the supplied lambda of the supplied type to this Key Object Adding an already existing Permission or a Permission where the equivalent User-Permission exists, doesn't change anything
        Parameters:
        lambda - the supplied Lambda
        type - the supplied Type
        Throws:
        InsufficientPermissionsException - if the current Threads authenticated Key has no Permission to Grant this kind of Permissions

      • grantPermission

        public void grantPermission(User user,
                            PermissionType type)
                     throws InsufficientPermissionsException
        Adds a Permission for the supplied User of the supplied type to this Key Object Adding an already existing Permission doesn't change anything
        Parameters:
        user - the supplied User
        type - the supplied Type
        Throws:
        InsufficientPermissionsException - if the current Threads authenticated Key has no Permission to Grant this kind of Permissions

      • revokePermission

        public void revokePermission(AbstractLambda lambda,
                             PermissionType type)
                      throws InsufficientPermissionsException
        Removes a Permission for the supplied lambda of the supplied type to this Key Object If the Permission doesn't exist, nothing changes
        Parameters:
        lambda - the supplied Lambda
        type - the supplied Type
        Throws:
        InsufficientPermissionsException - if the current Threads authenticated Key has no Permission to Grant this kind of Permissions

      • revokePermission

        public void revokePermission(User user,
                             PermissionType type)
                      throws InsufficientPermissionsException
        Removes a Permission for the supplied User of the supplied type to this Key Object If the Permission doesn't exist, nothing changes
        Parameters:
        user - the supplied User
        type - the supplied Type
        Throws:
        InsufficientPermissionsException - if the current Threads authenticated Key has no Permission to Grant this kind of Permissions

      • getKeyById

        public static Optional<Key> getKeyById(String id)
        Searches in the database for a Key object with the supplied id
        Parameters:
        id - id parameter of the key
        Returns:
        an optional with the found key or an empty Optional if such a key doesn't exist
